title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 8 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 8 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O LORD, our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.
lineList.cn: 耶和华我们的主阿，你的名在全地何其美。你将你的荣耀彰显于天。

lineList.en: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
lineList.cn: 你因敌人的缘故，从婴孩和吃奶的口中，建立了能力，使仇敌和报仇的，闭口无言。

lineList.en: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;
lineList.cn: 我观看你指头所造的天，并你所陈设的月亮星宿，

lineList.en: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?
lineList.cn: 便说，人算什么，你竟顾念他。世人算什么，你竟眷顾他。

lineList.en: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
lineList.cn: 你叫他比天使微小一点，并赐他荣耀尊贵为冠冕。

lineList.en: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:
lineList.cn: 你派他管理你手所造的，

lineList.en: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
lineList.cn: *使万物，就是一切的牛羊，田野的兽，空中的鸟，海里的鱼，

lineList.en: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.
lineList.cn: *凡经行海道的，都服在他的脚下。

lineList.en: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
lineList.cn: 耶和华我们的主阿，你的名在全地何其美。
